articles.author: Curt Devine, Majlie de Puy Kamp and Scott Glover, CNN
articles.title: Giuliani uses unfounded 'Antifa' argument to defend Trump
articles.description: President Donald Trump's personal attorney Rudy Giuliani has been working to bolster conspiratorial claims that left-wing agitators played a dominant role in the last week's Capitol riot.

The story is a TV news realignment. Fox News Channel's ratings have sagged ever since Election Day. And CNN's ratings have surged to historic levels. These shifts are related, but it's not as simple as "X is up so Y is down."(view.newsletters.cnn.com)
articles.content:
The TV news realignment
